IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE HARTFORD PUBLIC LIBRARY IS TO PROVIDE FREE RESOURCES THAT INSPIRE READING, GUIDE LEARNING, AND ENCOURAGE INDIVIDUAL EXPLORATION
IRS990.Desc: TO PROMOTE AND SUPPORT LITERACY AND LEARNING; TO PROVIDE FREE AND OPEN ACCESS TO INFORMATION AND IDEAS AND TO HELP PEOPLE PARTICIPATE IN OUR DEMOCRATIC SOCIETY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE LIBRARY'S COLLECTION CONSISTS OF ART WORK AND BOOKS. THE COLLECTION FULLFILLS THE MISSION TO PROVIDE FREE RESOURCES THAT INSPIRE READING, LEARNING AND ENCOURAGE INDIVIDUAL EXPLORATION.
RECONCILIATION FROM ACCRUAL TO CASH FOR 990 PREPARATION 87,465. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE ON 990 51,927.
RECONCILIATION FROM ACCRUAL TO CASH FOR 990 PREPARATION -171,247. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE ON 990 51,927.

THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SETTING THE COMPENSATION RATE FOR THE CEO OF THE HARTFORD PUBLIC LIBRARY BASED ON A COMPREHENSIVE REVIEW OF MARKET AND COMPARABLE COMPENSATION FOR LIKE-SIZED AND TYPE ORGANIZATION. THE LATEST SALARY/COMPENSATION STUDY WAS COMPLETED IN 2021.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A REQUIRED ELEMENT OF ORGANIZATIONAL INCORPORATION, HARTFORD PUBLIC LIBRARY AMBASSADORS RATIFY THE APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEW FORM 990 BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HARTFORD PUBLIC LIBRARY REQUIRES AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY BOARD MEMBERS AND STAFF, WHO ARE ALSO REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD COMPLETED A COMPREHENSIVE PERFORMANCE EVALUATION OF THE CEO WHICH INCLUDED PARTICIPATION FROM ALL BOARD MEMBERS. THE COMPENSATION WAS DISCUSSED AS PART OF THE PERFORMANCE EVALUATION AND ALL BOARD MEMBERS WERE INVITED TO PROVIDE INPUT AND FEEDBACK REGARDING THE RECOMMENDED CEO COMPENSATION. COMPARABILITY DATA FOR OTHER NON-PROFIT EXECUTIVES IN SIMILAR POSITIONS IN SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS WAS CONSIDERED AS PART OF THIS PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON THEIR WEBSITE AND UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON THEIR WEBSITE AND UPON REQUEST.
